document.heading: Department of Parks and Recreation Fee-based Use Permit Authority Clarification Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-216, the “Department of Parks and Recreation Fee-based Use Permit Authority Clarification Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-904. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 18, 2014, and Dec. 2, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 18, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-520 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-216 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
